results.title: Simvastatin attenuates inflammatory process on LPS-induced acute lung injury in mice.

results.title: Re-analysis of ventilator-free days (VFD) in acute respiratory distress syndrome (ARDS) studies
results.text_hl: Delayed Enteral Nutrition (EDEN), @GENE_HMGCR @GENE_3156 @@@Hydroxymethylglutaryl-CoA reductase@@@ inhibition with @<m>CHEMICAL_Simvastatin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D019821 @@@simvastatin@@@ in @<m>DISEASE_Acute_Lung_Injury</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D055371 @@@Acute Lung Injury@@@ (@<m>DISEASE_Acute_Lung_Injury</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D055371 @@@ALI@@@) to reduce @DISEASE_Pulmonary_Heart_Disease @DISEASE_MESH:D011660 @@@pulmonary dysfunction@@@ (HARP-2), Statins for @<m>DISEASE_Acute_Lung_Injury</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D055371 @@@Acutely Injured Lungs from Sepsis@@@ (SAILS)) were used for analysis, with the VFD results summarised using mean, standard deviation (SD), median, interquartile range (25th and 75th percentiles) and minimum and maximum values.

citations.NLM: Verghis RM, McDowell C, Blackwood B, Lee B, McAuley DF, Clarke M. Re-analysis of ventilator-free days (VFD) in acute respiratory distress syndrome (ARDS) studies Trials. 2023 Mar 13;24(1):183. PMID: 36907882

results.title: Elevated Plasma Interleukin-18 Identifies High-Risk Acute Respiratory Distress Syndrome Patients not Distinguished by Prior Latent Class Analyses Using Traditional Inflammatory Cytokines: A Retrospective Analysis of Two Randomized Clinical Trials.
results.text_hl: DESIGN: Statins for @DISEASE_Acute_Disease @DISEASE_MESH:D000208 @@@acutely@@@ injured @DISEASE_Lung_Diseases @DISEASE_MESH:D008171 @@@lungs@@@ from @DISEASE_Sepsis @DISEASE_MESH:D018805 @@@sepsis@@@ (@<m>DISEASE_Acute_Lung_Injury</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D055371 @@@SAILS@@@) and @GENE_HMGCR @GENE_3156 @@@hydroxymethylglutaryl-CoA reductase@@@ inhibition with @<m>CHEMICAL_Simvastatin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D019821 @@@simvastatin@@@ in @<m>DISEASE_Acute_Lung_Injury</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D055371 @@@acute lung injury@@@ to reduce @DISEASE_Pulmonary_Heart_Disease @DISEASE_MESH:D011660 @@@pulmonary dysfunction@@@ trial (HARP-2) are two large randomized, controlled trials in @DISEASE_Respiratory_Distress_Syndrome @DISEASE_MESH:D012128 @@@ARDS@@@ in which both LCA assignments and @GENE_IL18 @GENE_3606 @@@IL-18@@@ levels were shown to predict mortality.

citations.NLM: Moore AR, Pienkos SM, Sinha P, Guan J, O'Kane CM, Levitt JE, Wilson JG, Shankar-Hari M, Matthay MA, Calfee CS, Baron RM, McAuley DF, Rogers AJ. Elevated Plasma Interleukin-18 Identifies High-Risk Acute Respiratory Distress Syndrome Patients not Distinguished by Prior Latent Class Analyses Using Traditional Inflammatory Cytokines: A Retrospective Analysis of Two Randomized Clinical Trials. Crit Care Med. 2023 Sep 11;():. PMID: 37695136

results.title: Elevated ferritin, mediated by IL-18 is associated with systemic inflammation and mortality in acute respiratory distress syndrome (ARDS).
results.text_hl: METHODS: Baseline plasma ferritin concentrations were measured in @SPECIES_9606 @@@patients@@@ with @DISEASE_Respiratory_Distress_Syndrome @DISEASE_MESH:D012128 @@@ARDS@@@ from two randomised controlled trials of @<m>CHEMICAL_Simvastatin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D019821 @@@simvastatin@@@ (@GENE_HMGCR @GENE_3156 @@@Hydroxymethylglutaryl-CoA Reductase@@@ Inhibition with @<m>CHEMICAL_Simvastatin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D019821 @@@Simvastatin@@@ in @<m>DISEASE_Acute_Lung_Injury</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D055371 @@@Acute Lung Injury@@@ to Reduce @DISEASE_614113 @DISEASE_OMIM:614113 @@@Pulmonary Dysfunction-2@@@ (@DISEASE_Encephalitis_Herpes_Simplex @DISEASE_MESH:D020803 @@@HARP-2@@@); discovery cohort, UK) and @DISEASE_Neuromuscular_Manifestations @DISEASE_MESH:D020879 @@@neuromuscular blockade@@@ (ROSE; validation cohort, USA).

citations.NLM: Mehta P, Samanta RJ, Wick K, Coll RC, Mawhinney T, McAleavey PG, Boyle AJ, Conlon J, Shankar-Hari M, Rogers A, Calfee CS, Matthay MA, Summers C, Chambers RC, McAuley DF, O'Kane CM. Elevated ferritin, mediated by IL-18 is associated with systemic inflammation and mortality in acute respiratory distress syndrome (ARDS). Thorax. 2023 Dec 26;():. PMID: 38148147

results.title: The relationship between plasma cystatin C, mortality and acute respiratory distress syndrome subphenotype in the HARP-2 trial
results.text_hl: Design, @SPECIES_9606 @@@patients@@@ and setting: A retrospective analysis was performed on plasma samples from @SPECIES_9606 @@@patients@@@ included in the HARP-2 (@GENE_HMGCR @GENE_3156 @@@hydroxymethylglutaryl-CoA reductase@@@ inhibition with @<m>CHEMICAL_Simvastatin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D019821 @@@simvastatin@@@ in @<m>DISEASE_Acute_Lung_Injury</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D055371 @@@acute lung injury@@@ to reduce @DISEASE_Pulmonary_Heart_Disease @DISEASE_MESH:D011660 @@@pulmonary dysfunction@@@) trial : a multicentre, phase 2b trial carried out in general intensive care units across 40 hospitals in the United Kingdom and Ireland.

citations.NLM: McKelvey MC, Bradbury I, McDowell C, Calfee CS, Weldon S, O'Kane CM, McAuley DF, Taggart CC. The relationship between plasma cystatin C, mortality and acute respiratory distress syndrome subphenotype in the HARP-2 trial Crit Care Resusc. 2022 Sep 5;24(3):251-258. PMID: 38046206
